General.Name: Zhejiang Sunrise Garment Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Sunrise Garment Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of textile fabrics and garments in China, Vietnam, Cambodia, Sri Lanka, and internationally. It operates through Yarn, Fabric, Garment, and Others segment. The company produces and sells knitted garments, woven garments, knitted fabrics, woven fabrics, and yarns. It also engages in the cotton planting, spinning, dyeing and finishing, printing and embroidery, and garment cutting and sewing. In addition, it produces anti-epidemic materials and photovoltaic energy. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Shengzhou, China.
General.Address: Shengzhou Economic Development Zone, Shengzhou, China, 312400
